title: Descriptions: Color / Objects (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Color / Objects subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: She has a pinkish beige cell phone.
cards.romaji: Kanojo wa hadairo no keitai wo motte iru.
cards.japanese: 彼女は肌色の携帯を持っている。

cards.english: I rode in a reddish purple car.
cards.romaji: Akamurasaki iro no kuruma ni norimashita.
cards.japanese: 赤紫色の車に乗りました。

cards.english: Japanese name stamps are a bright red color.
cards.romaji: Nihon no hanko wa shuiro desu.
cards.japanese: 日本のハンコは朱色です。
